entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
